description:
A new student, Ryuji Otogi, defeats Jonouchi in a game of Duel Monsters, forcing Jonouchi to become his servant.  Ryuji forces Jonouchi to wear a dog costume and humiliates him in public, forcing Yugi to challenge Duke to a duel.  However, this will not be a Duel Monsters duel, but a new game named Dungeon Dice Monsters!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le duel des monstres des dés - 1re partie
謎の転校生 御伽龍児
